title: Fly to Paraguay, new UK farm stays, Berlin in London: Travel agenda - News & Advice - Travel
text:
Stay in San Fran 
Axiom, a new boutique hotel in San Francisco, will open this month. It will have 152 rooms and contemporary, industrial decor, including exposed pipes, and lights hanging from cables. Guests can also use a tech-friendly communal area called “Cloud”. axiomhotel.com 
Art and soul 
A new multi-arts centre, LAC Lugano Arte e Cultura, opens in the Swiss city of Lugano next Saturday. The centre, which overlooks Lake Lugano, will host exhibitions, concerts and other events and, to mark its opening, there will be three weekends of celebrations from 12 to 27 September, including a retrospective of British artist Anthony McCall's work. luganolac.ch 
Eat natural 
Farm Stay UK has launched a new collection of autumn foraging breaks on working farms and rural properties across the UK. The collection includes “mushroom school” in south-west Scotland, wild foraging walks in Cornwall, and hedgerow hunting in Kent and Yorkshire. Packages start at £85pp. farmstay.co.uk 
Line up 
The first domestic railway to be constructed in the UK in 100 years is to open tomorrow in the Scottish Borders. The Borders Railway runs south from Edinburgh to Tweedbank, close to the historic market town of Melrose. bordersrailway.co.uk 
Grand plans 
From 18 to 20 September, city visitors will be given special access to Genoa's 42 Unesco-listed palaces. The “Palazzi dei Rolli” are in Genoa's historic centre, and include 21 not usually accessible to the public, such as Palazzo Nicola Grimaldi, a private property. visitgenoa.it 
Asunción Fly to Paraguay 
Asunción, the capital of Paraguay, becomes easier to reach from 16 December, when Air Europa launches a new route from Madrid to the land-locked South American nation. The twice-weekly service has connections from Gatwick, with through fares starting at around £700 return. Alternatively, you can choose to “self-connect” through the Spanish capital. aireuropa.com 
Pop-up culture 
Berlin is coming to London. visitBerlin will be showcasing products from the German capital in a pop-up store in Shoreditch from 5 to 11 October. As well as selling food and fashion, Pop into Berlin will also feature goodie bag give-aways, and the chance to dance in one of the world's smallest disco booths. visitberlin.de 
Take the kids 
Abercrombie and Kent has a new Families brochure, divided into: wildlife and safari, adventure and activity, culture and education, beach resorts, and villas and chalets. It also contains information on flying times, visas and jabs. abercrombiekent.co.uk/family
